definitions: the quality not shaking or moving

examples.text: I admire the steadiness of her hands

shortDefinitions: quality of not shaking or moving

definitions: the quality of being controlled, and not faltering or wavering

examples.text: his voice loses steadiness when pushed

shortDefinitions: quality of being unfaltering or unwavering

definitions: the quality of being sensible, reliable, and self-restrained

examples.text: we got a glimpse of the steadiness and maturity we need to steer through this crisis

shortDefinitions: quality of being sensible and self-restrained

definitions: the quality of being regular, even, and continuous in development, frequency, or intensity

examples.text: the relative steadiness of prices during 2013 was an indication that the market was adequately supplied

shortDefinitions: quality of being regular and continuous in development
